sentences: Fursy Teyssier (born 22 September 1985) is a French songwriter, singer, multi-instrumentalist musician, album cover artist and animated film director.
He is currently live bass guitarist for Empyrium.
Since 27 December 2015 he is a live member of German gothic metal band The Vision Bleak; he previously directed the music video for their song "The Wood Hag".
Alcest - Écailles de Lune (2010) - composer, keyboards and various others in "Abysses"
Sombres Forêts - La mort du soleil (2013)
